attributes.action: ban all corporal punishment of children and educate parents in alternative methods of discipline
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned petition to the Prime Minister and the Government to consider a total ban of all corporal punishment of under-18's and to  employ better measures of educating parents on how to discipline their children. We wish to ensure that all measures taken to ensue the fulfillment of the above are in accordance with the UN Convention on the Rights of the Child.
We again wish to ensure that no laws which will allow the corporal punishment of children in any case are approved on the grounds of the above said UN Convention.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
